subtitle: The best tourist experience in Rio's favelas

about.title: About Us
about.paragraph1: Tour to Favela is an agency created by residents of Rocinha, with the purpose of showing our neighborhood as it truly is — vibrant, creative, and full of inspiring stories.
about.paragraph2: More than just a tour, we offer immersive experiences that bring visitors closer to the local culture, revealing the daily life, the people, and the energy that make Rocinha one of the most unique places in Rio de Janeiro.
about.paragraph3: Our main goal is to break stereotypes and value the favela, showing its human, authentic, and welcoming side. The name 'Tour to Favela' reflects this mission: 'to' means 'for the favela', representing our commitment to strengthen and empower the community.
about.paragraph4: At the same time, the name also plays with the idea of 'Tour 2 Favela', as we are two local guides passionate about telling our own story.
about.paragraph5: At Tour to Favela, we believe every visit is an exchange — between cultures, perspectives, and realities — and that getting to know Rocinha is to experience the true spirit of Rio: diversity, resilience, and joy.
